1.name: Gema Arnaiz Delgado
1.title: Ruby on rails Developer
1.shortBio: Enganchada a las nuevas tecnologías, actualmente trabaja en BEEVA como desarolladora en el área de Iaas...
1.bio: Enganchada a las nuevas tecnologías, actualmente trabaja en BEEVA como desarolladora en el área de Iaas & Open Systems, compaginándolo con su faceta freelance de desarolladora iOS. Forma parte de las comunidades GDG Spain como organizer en Burgos y Tech&ladies.

2.name: Gema Parreño
2.title: R&D Developer
2.shortBio: Gema Parreño is a several times awarded product designer that has been focused into Artificial Intelligence...
2.bio: Gema Parreño is a several times awarded product designer that has been focused into Artificial Intelligence and software architecture for 2 years highlighting experiences with Natual Languaje Understanding. She is now developing recursive neural networks and clustering classifications in Tensor Flow with Python since Google opened TensorFlow focusing now on Sentiment Analysis and computer vision . The talk will be focused on reverse ingeeniering of a limbic system and a neural net demo using computer vision.

3.name: Gerardo Vazquez
3.title: Arquitecto de empresa
3.shortBio: Tras años como administrador y trabajar en integración de sistemas descubrió el fantástico mundo del BigData...
3.bio: Tras años como administrador y trabajar en integración de sistemas descubrió el fantástico mundo del BigData. Empezo a trabajar con distribuciones Hadoop en 2012 llegando a ser profesor certificado por Cloudera. Actualmente trabaja en BEEVA en el área de BigData.

4.name: Sergio Ocón
4.title: Partner Integration Manager
4.shortBio: With more than 15 years of experience at the IT industry, in customers and vendors in different positions from R&D, product development and sales...
4.bio: With more than 15 years of experience at the IT industry, in customers and vendors in different positions from R&D, product development and sales. Currenlty he works at Red Hat, the world's leading provider of open source software solutions and the company ranked #23 Best Place to Work in 2014 by Glassdoor.com. He is responsible for partner integration and joint development in CloudForms, the open source project to manage hybrid clouds, worldwide.

5.name: Santiago Saavedra
5.title: CEO
5.shortBio: Santiago is a science enthusiast and bears a passion for Computer Science and Free Software, with great scientific curiosity...
5.bio: Santiago is a science enthusiast and bears a passion for Computer Science and Free Software, with great scientific curiosity. He's been engaged in many subfields of Computer Science, from collaborative edition in distributed systems, to formal methods for software verification. Currently the President of GPUL and Organizer in GDG A Coruña, he plays the piano and tinkers with Deep Learning in his free time.

6.name: César Silgo
6.title: Head of Technology
6.shortBio: Passionate developer with an interest in innovation and Open Source. Geek, addicted to strategy games and sci-fi...
6.bio: Passionate developer with an interest in innovation and Open Source. Geek, addicted to strategy games and sci-fi. César participates in different aspects of the process of creating and delivering software, although his specialties are AWS, REST APIs and the Hadoop ecosystem. César is Cloud Architect and Head of Technology at BEEVA, a company formed by enthusiastic people involved in challenging projects.

7.name: Borja Godoy
7.title: Profesional Frontend Development
7.shortBio: Borja es actualmente Frontend developer en Sngular y GDG organizer.  En proceso de polymerización y aprendiendo a hacer el desarrollo web más fácil...
7.bio: Borja es actualmente Frontend developer en Sngular y GDG organizer.  En proceso de polymerización y aprendiendo a hacer el desarrollo web más fácil gracias a los web components y herramientas de generación de tooling como Yeoman.

8.name: Joaquín López
8.title: Head of Front-end Development Department
8.shortBio: Joaquín is a Front-end Lead Architect who is detail oriented, a team player, and possess great organizational and customer service skills...
8.bio: Joaquín is a Front-end Lead Architect who is detail oriented, a team player, and possess great organizational and customer service skills. He takes pride in his job. He is a problem solver, willing to learn, and a lover of technology. Joaquín started programming in Basic at the age of 8 (1989) with his Spectrum 128K. Since then, He has been obsessed with everything technological and digital and as a result he has developed a great passion for programming even had his own software development company for a while. Actually Joaquín is the Head of Front-end Development Department at Sngular managing international multicultural teams throughout USA, Spain and Mexico guiding his teammates to accomplish Sngular’s customers goals.

9.name: Rubén Aguilera
9.title: Senior Developer
9.shortBio: Ha protagonizado charlas en conferencias como T3chFest, PolymerDay y diversos Meetups (MadridJS, AngularJS Madrid, etc.). Algunas de las últimas...
9.bio: Ha protagonizado charlas en conferencias como T3chFest, PolymerDay y diversos Meetups (MadridJS, AngularJS Madrid, etc.). Algunas de las últimas que ha impartido son Empezando con Angular 2, ¡Haya paz, hermanos! (Polymer y Angular 2) o ¡Que viene Angular 2! Rubén Aguilera es un profesional con más de 10 años de experiencia, que desde 2009 desempeña su trabajo en Autentia como consultor tecnológico. Ha tenido la oportunidad de trabajar y formarse en muy distintas metodologías, herramientas y tecnologías tanto de servidor como de cliente.Comparte su conocimiento escribiendo tutoriales en la web www.adictosaltrabajo.com

10.name: Carlos Izquierdo
10.title: Big Data Architect
10.shortBio: Carlos Izquierdo is a Big Data architect focused in providing robust, scalable solutions at a reasonable cost. He likes tinkering with technology and discovering...
10.bio: Carlos Izquierdo is a Big Data architect focused in providing robust, scalable solutions at a reasonable cost. He likes tinkering with technology and discovering new tools, so he is quite up to date in IT needs and trends. He has worked in businesses big and small, as well as in academic environments. He always prefers open source and free software solutions, which he has been using for several years. His experience managing Big Data platforms allows him to provide insightful and hands-on solutions related to Hadoop and its ecosystem. Two years ago he founded a Data-oriented startup called Datatons.

11.name: Eduardo Sada
11.title: Especialista Javascript
11.shortBio: Eduardo es especialista Javascript en Kairós Digital Solutions. Con más de 10 años de experiencia en desarrollo front-end actualmente trabaja en el departamento...
11.bio: Eduardo es especialista Javascript en Kairós Digital Solutions. Con más de 10 años de experiencia en desarrollo front-end actualmente trabaja en el departamento de Arquitectura del proyecto Cells de BBVA.

12.name: David Capilla
12.title: Technical
12.shortBio: Infraestructure Base technician, admin systems and resolving issues. Innovation skills.
12.bio: Infraestructure Base technician, admin systems and resolving issues. Innovation skills.

13.name: Santiago Rodríguez
13.title: Data Scientist
13.shortBio: Santiago es Reference Data Scientist en s|ngular. Trabaja en proyectos de análisis de datos, aprendizaje automático y Big Data. Es Licenciado en...
13.bio: Santiago es Reference Data Scientist en s|ngular. Trabaja en proyectos de análisis de datos, aprendizaje automático y Big Data. Es Licenciado en Ciencias Físicas, especializado en Dispositivos Físicos y Control, por la UCM y se formó en Data Science y BigData en la UAM y MOOCs. Además ha trabajado en el desarrollo de aplicaciones móviles durante varios años. Es un entusiasta del análisis de datos, Data Science, Machine Learning, Big Data y temas relacionados.

14.name: Esteban Dorado
14.title: Programador Software
14.shortBio: Ingeniero informático y un early adopter de las nuevas tecnologias, actualmente trabaja en BEEVA como desarollador en el área de Iaas & Open Systems...
14.bio: Ingeniero informático y un early adopter de las nuevas tecnologias, actualmente trabaja en BEEVA como desarollador en el área de Iaas & Open Systems. Miembro de GDG Spain participando activamente en varios GDGs (Google Developers Groups) y organizador del GDG Granada.
